thread.title_full: BBC will allow Bafta luvvies to hit out at Donald Trump | Daily Mail Online

author: Paddy Dinham For Mailonline
title: BBC will allow Bafta luvvies to hit out at Donald Trump | Daily Mail Online
text: BBC will allow Bafta luvvies to hit out at Donald Trump in their acceptance speechesâ€¦ as long as they keep it short Hollywood's biggest names will descend on the Royal Albert Hall tomorrow Several A-listers have already hit out at Donald Trump during awards speeches The BBC will air the ceremony two hours after its conclusion It says it has a duty to uphold the views of any winners and nominees But it has warned that any elongated rambling is likely to be cut down
